evaluation.Q1: Does the chart effectively use a heatmap to display Internet and Smartphone Penetration Rates by country?

feedback.improvement: The heatmap structure effectively displays both Internet and Smartphone Penetration Rates for each country
Adjust color gradient to make differences more distinct, especially for mid-range values

evaluation.Q2: Are countries sorted on the y-axis according to their penetration rates?

feedback.improvement: Countries are sorted from lowest to highest Internet Penetration Rate

evaluation.Q3: Does the color gradient clearly represent different percentage ranges for both Internet and Smartphone penetration?

feedback.improvement: Color gradient effectively represents percentage ranges
Increase contrast between adjacent color levels for better differentiation

evaluation.Q4: Are exact penetration rate values labeled for each country in the heatmap?

feedback.improvement: Exact penetration rate values are clearly labeled for each country

evaluation.Q5: Is there a clear legend or color key that explains the meaning of different colors used in the heatmap?

feedback.improvement: Color key is present on the right side of the chart
Add percentage labels to the color key for easier interpretation

evaluation.Q6: Does the chart title clearly convey the purpose of visualizing Internet and Smartphone Penetration Rates across countries?

feedback.improvement: The title 'Internet and Smartphone Penetration Rates by Country' clearly conveys the purpose

evaluation.Q7: Is the text (country names, labels, title, legend) easily readable and consistent throughout the chart?

feedback.improvement: Text is consistently formatted and readable throughout the chart
Consider increasing font size slightly for better readability

evaluation.Q8: Does the heatmap design allow for quick identification of countries with notably high or low penetration rates?

feedback.improvement: Color gradient allows for quick identification of high and low penetration rates
Consider using a more contrasting color scheme to make extremes more apparent

evaluation.Q9: Can users easily compare Internet and Smartphone penetration rates for individual countries?

feedback.improvement: Side-by-side layout of Internet and Smartphone penetration rates facilitates easy comparison

evaluation.Q10: Is the x-axis scale for penetration rates clear and appropriately labeled?

feedback.improvement: X-axis is clearly labeled as 'Penetration Rates' with subcategories for Internet and Smartphone

evaluation.Q11: Does the color intensity accurately represent the corresponding penetration rate percentages?

feedback.improvement: Color intensity corresponds to penetration rate percentages
Increase color contrast for better differentiation between similar percentages

evaluation.Q12: Is the overall complexity and detail level of the chart appropriate for technology researchers?

feedback.improvement: The chart provides detailed information suitable for technology researchers
Consider adding a brief summary of key findings or trends for quicker insights

evaluation.Q13: Does the heatmap layout facilitate easy comparison between multiple countries?

feedback.improvement: The layout allows for easy comparison across countries

evaluation.Q14: Are there any visual cues that highlight significant patterns or trends in technology adoption across countries?

feedback.improvement: Include visual cues or annotations to highlight significant patterns or outliers
Consider adding trend lines or groupings to emphasize regional or economic similarities

evaluation.Q15: Does the chart maintain a good balance between showing detailed information and overall visual clarity?

feedback.improvement: The chart provides detailed information while maintaining overall clarity
Consider slight adjustments to color contrast and text size to further improve visual clarity
